item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/12/03/amazon-prime-air/#comment-4154">lauramoncur</a>.
If we can't have flying cars, we should at least get flying parcel delivery right!?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to lauramoncur.

If we can’t have flying cars, we should at least get flying parcel delivery right!?

item.title: By: lauramoncur
item.dc:creator: lauramoncur
item.description: OMG! That would be so cool. I wonder how old I will be by the time it's a reality.
item.content:encoded: OMG! That would be so cool. I wonder how old I will be by the time it’s a reality.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/12/03/amazon-prime-air/#comment-4152">julien51</a>.
I'm not sure. Given that there are years before anything drone related would be doable there could still be something that uses drones, but looks significantly different than what Air Prime is touted as being today.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

I’m not sure. Given that there are years before anything drone related would be doable there could still be something that uses drones, but looks significantly different than what Air Prime is touted as being today.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: Agreed. My bet is mostly on a PR stunt, the day before CyberMonday.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. My bet is mostly on a PR stunt, the day before CyberMonday.
